item.title: Character Creation
item.description: Roll ability scores Roll 3d6 three times. Assign each total to one of the ability scores of your choice, STR, DEX and WIl.

item.title: Combat
item.description: Before damage is rolled, Player Characters under attack have the following options: Defend The character tries to defend themselves without taking any particular risks or trying any moves.

item.title: Magic
item.description: Decide how many dice you are going to use to cast your spell.

item.title: Mechanics
item.description: Checks Roll 1d20 and add your modifier. The DM will tell you if you succeed or not. A roll of a natural 20 can indicate a Critical Success (yes, and).

item.title: Session 0
item.description: Principles Living World Their is no set plot, and the players are free to follow what interests them.

item.title: Vocations
item.description: Cleric For this campaign your character will start as a cleric of the Pluritine Church.
